    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualHost

        public VirtualHost​(java.lang.String serverName,
                   @Nullable
                   @Nullable java.net.InetAddress address,
                   @Nullable
                   @Nullable java.lang.String publicFolder,
                   @Nullable
                   @Nullable java.lang.String alias,
                   @Nullable
                   @Nullable java.lang.String documentRoot,
                   @Nullable
                   @Nullable java.lang.Boolean rewriteEngine)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        serverName - Domain name
        address - Ip Address
        publicFolder - Public folder from where the content will be served
        alias - Alias for the web-site - usually www.example.com
        documentRoot - Document root
        rewriteEngine - Initially set RewriteEngine off -Default false

    • Method Detail

      • addConf

        private void addConf()
              throws java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.NullPointerException
        Adds the configuration to apache for the given parameters
        Throws:
        java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException - Throws an error if the config file exits
        java.io.IOException - If it fails to create new config file, mainly because of root access
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • createDirectoryForVirtualHost

        private void createDirectoryForVirtualHost()
                                    throws java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException
        Created the directory for the given virtual host
        Throws:
        java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException - Throws an error if the folder exits

        boolean
